sketchupblocks.math

Class Line

  • java.lang.Object
    • sketchupblocks.math.Line
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Line
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The Line class wraps the information contained in a 3D line: - A point on the line -The direction of the line
    Author:
    cravingoxygen
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Line

        public Line(Vec3 _point,
    Vec3 _direction)
        Constructor that accepts a point and direction, thereby defining a line. The line is defined in 3D space. point_on_line = lambda*direction + point
        Parameters:
        _point - - The point in the line equation
        _direction - - The direction vector of the line
